# updateName(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the name of the action set.

## Declaration

```swift
func updateName(_ name: String, completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func updateName(_ name: String) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The new name; must not be `nil`.
- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Identifiying an action set

- **uniqueIdentifier**: The action set’s unique identifier.
- **name**: The name of the action set.
